Description:
Detects suspicious PowerShell download command

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious PowerShell Download
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((data like '%.downloadfile(%' or data like '%.downloadstring(%') and data like '%net.webclient%')
